title: N26 bank could introduce native cryptocurrency trading later this year
content:
Fintech companies are all the rage in recent years, with players such as Curve, N26, and Revolut entering the space, especially in Europe. Revolut has blown up in some parts of Europe thanks to its approach to banking and additional perks rolled into one app such as stock trading and cryptocurrency trading, not to mention

The post N26 bank could introduce native cryptocurrency trading later this year appeared first on xda-developers.
description: N26 bank may soon introduce native cryptocurrency trading, an APK teardown has revealed. It shows the partner and some of how it will work.
